description: Returns information about a billing group. Requires permission to access the DescribeBillingGroup action.

parameters.name: billingGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the billing group.

nested_items.name: billingGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the billing group.

nested_items.name: billingGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the billing group.

nested_items.name: billingGroupArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the billing group.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the billing group.

nested_items.name: billingGroupProperties
nested_items.description: The properties of the billing group.

nested_items.name: billingGroupDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the billing group.

nested_items.name: billingGroupMetadata
nested_items.description: Additional information about the billing group.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date the billing group was created.
